appetizers.name: Mozzarella Cheese Sticks
appetizers.description: Six Mazzarella Sticks, lightly battered and seasoned inhouse everyday

appetizers.name: Chicken Tenders
appetizers.description: Air fryer chicken tenders are crunchy on the outside, moist on the inside, and full of flavor. These chicken breast tenders are marinated in pickle juice to help lock in moisture and provide a ton of flavor.

cold sandwiches.name: Salami, Mozzarella and Roasted Red Pepper Sandwich
cold sandwiches.description: This simple yet flavorful Italian sandwich is made with fresh mozzarella, zesty salami, sweet roasted red peppers, vibrant basil leaves, and rich, buttery olive oil.

cold sandwiches.name: Goat Cheese, Rosemary Ham, Apple & Honey Sandwich With Fresh Arugula
cold sandwiches.description: Looking for a way to make your lunchbox more exciting? Try this tasty French-style sandwich with rosemary ham, goat cheese, apple, lemon, and arugula! It's sweet, salty, spicy, and crunchy and makes the perfect lunchtime meal.

hot sandwiches.name: Classic Grilled Cheese
hot sandwiches.description: The king of comfort foods. A nostalgic taste of being a kid again. This grilled cheese is the stuff memoris are made of. It's warm, flavorful, perfectly melty and just like mom used to make

hot sandwiches.name: Grilled Corned Beef and Cabbage Sandwich
hot sandwiches.description: No St. Patrick’s Day celebration is complete without corned beef and cabbage. It’s tradition. But what if you could take that particular tradition and add one of your own? Like that trusty comfort food for the ages, the grilled cheese sandwich? Well, that’s exactly what we’ve done with this Cooper® Corned Beef and Cabbage Grilled Cheese. Two great traditions, together in tasty harmony.

desserts.name: Chewy Oatmeal Cookies
desserts.description: Just like grandma used to make. This classic cookie is full of flavor with a hint of cinnamon and nutmeg. Follow the recipe or switch it up and add chocolate chips, butterscotch chips, or peanut butter-flavored chips for a different take on a classic.

desserts.name: Peanut Butter Fudge
desserts.description: Smooth and creamy Fudge, the perfect post meal treat

drinks.name: Summer Sweet Lemonade
drinks.description: When life hands you 8 lemons, make Summer Sweet Lemonade to sip on.

drinks.name: Matcha Green Tea
drinks.description: Matcha, a traditional Japanese tea, is one of the most nutritious beverages you can consume. Bonus: It's pretty yummy, too.
